channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jon Bon Jovi Pays Tribute to Legendary Philadelphia DJ Pierre Robert: 'I Was Lucky to Have Him as Friend'
item.description: Robert was found dead in his home on Oct. 29, according to a statement shared with Inside Radio

item.title: Ellen Pompeo and Chris Ivery Make Rare Outing with All 3 Kids at World Series Game in L.A.

item.title: How Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis Are Celebrating Halloween

item.title: Jason Kelce Says Wife Kylie ‘Always Wins’ at Grilling This 1 Food: ‘It’s Very Frustrating’ (Exclusive)

item.title: Where Will Sarah Ferguson Live Now That Ex-Husband Prince Andrew Must Vacate Their Royal Lodge Home?
